name: corruptible
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
able to be made to do something dishonest or immoral: Some people have more confidence in women because they feel they are less corruptible. Perhaps some systems of government are more corruptible than others.
More examplesFewer examplesThese are extremely weak states which are easily corruptible.She believes everyone is either corrupt or corruptible.They pride themselves on being one of the region's most professional and least corruptible police forces.
